## Feature Summary
A brief description of the feature you'd like to see.

## Problem Statement
What problem does this feature solve? What pain point does it address?

## Proposed Solution
Describe your proposed solution in detail.

## Alternative Solutions
Describe any alternative solutions you've considered.

## Additional Context
- How would this feature fit into the existing architecture?
- Are there similar features in other research tools?
- Any mockups, diagrams, or examples?

## Implementation Notes
- Which components would need to be modified?
- Estimated complexity (Low/Medium/High)
- Dependencies or prerequisites
